title: One minor feature improvement...
comment: Great app for doing Go problems.  One feature tweak request: the 'back/last move' button (red arrow) when playing tsumego sometimes swaps place with the info button.  It's very routine for me to hit the back button many times in a row, and when I do this the last one brings up the info menu.  It's a constant, minor Ui frustration.

title: Excellent
comment: Essential app for any go enthusiast

title: How do you undelete
comment: I accidentally deleted one tsumego and have been unable to undelete.
The best on Google play.
Recent update broke tsumego memory. The app no longer remembers what problems I have solved.
can you drop me a mail to sort this problem out? ligi@ligi.de

title: Learning & practice
comment: This app has hundreds of practice problems of varying difficulties & pro games that have been commentated along with variation explanations. This is what ive be looking for . Helps me practice and learn on the go
Great
It's no smartgo kifu, but it's the best tool to record games on Android. I would like a better interface for editing and reviewing a sgf.

title: Best Go on android
comment: dat material design

title: Best GnuGo  interface for tablets
comment: Many android Go apps don't behave well on tablets, particularly in landscape mode. This one is probably the best if you want to play against GnuGo, and has a nice interface to sgf files too.

title: Brilliant!
comment: Well made game, smooth interface. Can use GnuGo a.i. too. I found this to be a really good game :)
Great!

title: Works!
comment: Sleek smooth go board with bonus tsumegos!

title: The best GoBan
comment: Have been exploring various go/goban in Android. This is by far the best app.
Great app to play go on mobile
Very useful

title: nice work!
comment: Add could you fix the gnugo crash problem? I know cannot edit gnugo easily, but you coud make it auto reload, right? Another problem is, there is no signal after gnugo resign, or coud you set a '--never-resign' option at gnugo? I like never resign too

Hi - thanks for your feedback! can you give me details about the gnugo crash problem? I do not play the AI my-self - I prefer humans as opponents ,-..
Please contact me via ligi@ligi.de

title: Excellent for learning to enjoy the game
comment: Works great, didn't think I would like the TV app, but it's nice too

title: Great app
comment: this is the best FREE go app in the market, but need improvements. Pls go on with regular updates. Thanks for this great app.

title: Excellent
comment: A very good sgf reader and editor. Also good tsumegos, and easy to use. Plus it's improving each time

title: Great app!
comment: Only request is to add more commentated games. Love the fact that it adds life and death problems at least once a month. Keep up the great work! !

thanks! I would also love to add more commented games - If you have a good source of (royalty)-free commented games drop me a line to ligi@ligi.de - I will try to crowd-source commented games in the future ( they can be created with gobandroid at the moment ) - but my time is sadly limited at the moment
What an excellent program! Commented games, tsumego (go problems) and it's perfect to record games played at your local Go Club. (It's always helpful to review your games). Recommended.

title: 5 stars
comment: Good app

title: Great app.
comment: Nice layout, great app to use. Please consider adding a shortcut to go to a specific move number when in review.

title: Excellent
comment: I'm just starting out with GO, so was a little hesitant to spend the cash. I already had a few other GO apps, free and paid. This turned out to be one fantastic app! I love the functional interface that lets you set up positions and edit them. With a couple hours of research I found sgf game collections to add to the review category. Let's you play, edit, view from any game or position. Thank you!

title: Great!
comment: Very good go study app for android

title: Can't save games
comment: Since update, saved games have phantom moves, and won't save additional moves.  Play, save, play again, save, then open,  no new moves saved.
Amazing

title: The best go app
comment: With tsumego, links for .sgf game files & possibility to play online (on google play), is the best android go (weiqi) apps. Thanks Ligi, you rock!

title: Great portable Go
comment: Along with the self-study capabilities, one of the things I most love about this app is the ability to use it as a portable Goban wherever I might be and being able to save those games for study later.

title: Bugs
comment: Great go app, but the undo and redo does not work against the computer opponent. Would be 5 stars otherwise.

title: Horrible Uninstaller
comment: I tried to uninstall to save space for other apps, but now 'Gobandroid TV' icon remains on my homescreen and can't seem to remove it! :-(
How have you uninstalled & what launcher/ROM do you use? The uninstaller from the system/play store is used. So there is no "gobandroid uninstaller". I am sorry, but I think I can't help there.

title: Sizing
comment: The image doesnt fit the screen. Some characters cut off. Cell=kyocera ryze
In which screen do you encounter this problem?
Kai

title: Fantastic program!
comment: Edit: Well, I just wasn't looking hard enough for the option I wanted. However, I will say this, I'm liking the beta so far and will look forward to it's release!  When watching, I'd like the option to manually progress the moves and then switch back to autoplay if i want to.

title: Awrsome!
comment: Love it. Its great. So many features for go players.

title: best game recording app
comment: I've tried a lot of go/baduk/weiqi apps, both in google play and outside from Asia. this is by far the best game recording app. others might be better for game review or online play. but recording wise, this is the best.

title: Excellent
comment: I love Go and this is a great Android version of it

title: For larger formats
comment: Had to get tiny version for.my phone - so happy to find a go yeacher app, yay

title: Hamedcom
comment: Great app
Thanks

title: Great program
comment: Could have more problems and also include tetsuji problems.

title: Great potential
comment: but quite flaky

title: Great idea, poor execution
comment: The user interface is a bit awkward. The exercises don't even state whose move it is, let alone any specific objective. It's a pretty good start toward a broadly functional go program for portable devices, but maybe it's trying to do too many things at once.   I'd be more than happy to have different apps for different purposes (exercises, network play, local play, game review, etc) if they did each well.

You should have a look at the latest version. You can see who is to move in the actionbar. Unfortunately I won't split the app as I had a modular splitted gobandroid once and users have not installed the other parts and demanded a single app

title: Great functionality, clunky UI
comment: This is the best goban app I have found.  Play against a friend or against GnuGo.

title: Tsumego mode needs updates
comment: It should have a "next" button and a randomize mode. Also, compatibility with strength grades in the problem sgf would be cool. The next button is essential though.
Thanks for the Feedback! The next button is available in the latest version !-)
Great program to learn and play GO!

title: Excelent
comment: Simply amazing.

title: Excellent
comment: Since 0.88 this is now my primary go-app (aside from andgs for dgs-games). Hands down the best app for recording and reviewing games.

title: Good but...
comment: Too many crashes when playing gnugo.

title: Brilliant
comment: This is fantastic, it's everything a go lover needs. Not technically perfect, but I'll be following the updates really closely. Good work!

title: ***** EXCELLENT!!! *****
comment: Very intuitive and sensitive play. Easy to place stones on 19x19! one of the better Go apps for sure if not the best!
Excellent. It is exactly what I am looking for.

title: Essential!
comment: Best option for recording and reviewing games.
